entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [EF CORE 7] Ability in an entity to Map a property targeting a View #30567
  • Query/Json: projecting entity collection along with json collection generates invalid shaper #30565
  • Translate constructors to SQL #30564
  • Porting Entity Framework to EF: constraints naming #30562
  • OwnsMany when updating owner entity doesn't perform insert statement if the owned entity contains a Guid property #30558
  • Navigation expression doesn't work in user defined function #30557
  • Table-Valued Parameter from local List with Join of DbSet #30556
  • `Select(x => x.Parent.Field).Count().Distinct()` produces an inefficient query #30555

Closed

  • TemporalAll() exception: Either the query source is not an entity type, or the specified property does not exist on the entity type. #30561
  • Circular dependency exception when switching values for unique index fields #30560
  • Why the collection of related entities includes only one entity and not all? #30559

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix to #30266 - Linq select cannot project an entity containing both Json columns and ICollections #30566

Updated

  • Fix to #30115 - IndexOutOfRangeException in CreateNavigationExpansionExpression(Expression sourceExpression, IEntityType entityType) / get_Chars(Int32 index) when EF class named "<>f__AnonymousType01Child" in 7.0.2 version #30537
